site.title: Big Rock Intelligence
site.description: AI-driven cybersecurity advisory firm headquartered in Frankfurt and operating across Germany and Europe.
site.tagline: Bridging AI Innovation with Enterprise Security

hero.title: Strategic Cybersecurity & AI Advisory
hero.subtitle: Empowering organizations with strategic guidance in cybersecurity and AI integration to enable secure digital transformation.

overview.title: Executive Overview
overview.description: Big Rock Intelligence provides executive-level advisory services in cybersecurity and AI integration. With 25+ years of experience in global leadership, we offer tailored solutions for enterprises, SMBs, VCs/PEs, and Boards.
overview.expertise: Expertise in cybersecurity, AI and global leadership
overview.tailored: Services tailored for Enterprise Leaders, SMB Owners, VC & Private Equity Firms, and Board Members

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity and AI advisory services tailored to your organization's needs.

general.title: General Services
general.description: Our core offerings in cybersecurity and AI integration.

strategic.title: Strategic Services
strategic.description: Specialized groups of intellectual property and bespoke advisory engagements for unique business challenges.

advisory.title: Advisory Services
advisory.description: Strategic guidance for specific leadership roles.

executive-communication-framework.title: Executive Communication Framework
executive-communication-framework.description: Transform technical security metrics into strategic business insights that resonate with board members and C-suite executives.
executive-communication-framework.metric: 85% improvement in executive alignment on security priorities
executive-communication-framework.question: Does your board see security as a cost center or strategic enabler? How effectively are you translating technical security metrics into business impact language your executives understand and value?

cyber-risk-quantification.title: Cyber Risk Quantification
cyber-risk-quantification.description: Replace subjective risk assessments with data-driven financial modeling that quantifies cyber risks in monetary terms.
cyber-risk-quantification.question: Can you express your top cyber risks in revenue impact terms your CFO will understand? How are you currently deciding which security investments deliver the highest risk reduction per dollar spent?

ai-security-strategy-enterprise.title: AI Security Strategy
ai-security-strategy-enterprise.description: Develop a comprehensive AI security roadmap that aligns with your enterprise's AI adoption journey.
ai-security-strategy-enterprise.question: How are you securing your AI initiatives differently from traditional applications? What protection mechanisms have you implemented against uniquely AI-centric threats like model poisoning or inference manipulation?

fractional-ciso-service.title: Fractional CISO Service
fractional-ciso-service.description: Access senior security leadership expertise without the full-time executive cost.
fractional-ciso-service.question: What security expertise gaps are limiting your business growth? How is the lack of executive security leadership impacting your ability to enter new markets or close enterprise deals?

investment-ready-security.title: Investment-Ready Security
investment-ready-security.description: Prepare your security posture for investor scrutiny and due diligence.
investment-ready-security.question: Would your security program withstand investor due diligence today? What security gaps might be negatively impacting your company's valuation or creating post-investment surprises?

cloud-security-optimization.title: Cloud Security Optimization
cloud-security-optimization.description: Maximize cloud security while minimizing costs and complexity for growing businesses.
cloud-security-optimization.question: Is your cloud environment both secure and cost-optimized? How effectively are you leveraging native security capabilities in your cloud platforms versus paying for additional security tools?

technical-value-creation.title: Technical Value Creation
technical-value-creation.description: Transform security from a due diligence checkbox into a strategic value accelerator across your portfolio.
technical-value-creation.metric: Up to 15% valuation improvement through security optimization
technical-value-creation.question: Is your security strategy enhancing or limiting company valuations? How effectively have you translated security investments into tangible business value that investors recognize and reward?

cybersecurity-investment-advisory.title: Cybersecurity Investment Advisory
cybersecurity-investment-advisory.description: Gain strategic insight into cybersecurity market trends, investment opportunities, and technology evolution to inform investment theses and portfolio strategy.
cybersecurity-investment-advisory.metric: 3x better identification of security market opportunities
cybersecurity-investment-advisory.question: What emerging security categories represent the highest growth potential over the next 24-36 months? How effectively can you evaluate the technical differentiation claims of security startups?

board-cyber-education-program.title: Board Cyber Education Program
board-cyber-education-program.description: Elevate your board's security expertise through our tailored education program that builds cyber fluency through contextual learning without technical overload.
board-cyber-education-program.question: How confident is your board in evaluating AI and security investments? What knowledge gaps prevent directors from providing effective security governance and appropriate challenge to management?

security-investment-validation.title: Security Investment Validation
security-investment-validation.description: Verify the effectiveness of your organization's security investments with independent validation of security program performance and spending efficiency.
security-investment-validation.question: How do you know your security investments are delivering intended outcomes? What objective validation confirms your security spending is optimally allocated against actual risks?

ai-governance-advisory.title: AI Governance Advisory
ai-governance-advisory.description: Develop board-level governance frameworks for responsible AI adoption and oversight.
ai-governance-advisory.question: What governance mechanisms has your board established specifically for AI oversight? How do you ensure appropriate balance between AI innovation and responsible deployment?

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team to discuss how we can help your organization.
contact.name: James Cameron

frankfurtHub.title: Frankfurt Hub
frankfurtHub.description: Our European headquarters in Frankfurt, Germany.
frankfurtHub.reachDescription: From our Frankfurt hub, we serve clients across Europe with a focus on Germany, Austria, Switzerland, and the UK.
frankfurtHub.expertiseDescription: Our team combines deep local knowledge with global cybersecurity and AI expertise.
